title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Cambricon a.k.a. ‘China’s Nvidia’ says revenue spiked 14-fold last quarter. The ensuing stock frenzy made its CEO one of the world’s richest people
items.description: Chen Tianshi is the 40-year-old founder and CEO of Beijing-based Cambricon, an AI chip company that posted a monster earnings report last week.

items.title: How a Free Service Helped This Company Reach $4 Million in Sales

items.description: The S&P 500 has touched all-time highs following 3 of the last 5 CPI reports.

items.description: Failure is an essential prerequisite for success, research shows.

items.title: CEO of IT firm with 350K workers says AI will create more entry level jobs—and he’s recruiting liberal arts graduates
items.description: Ravi Kumar S of Cognizant Technology Solutions says AI will widen the base of corporate employment and ‘the path to expertise is going to be faster.’

items.title: AI ‘Consulting’ Services Can Help Smaller Businesses, But Risks Persist
items.description: As with anything related to AI-generated content, it’s important to keep a human in the loop before you act on any of its business advice.
